column1: #Text=" Aang says : " Oh , I did n't think you would need it , Sokka .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Aw , it 's all tangled !
#Text=I thought since you lost your other one ... " Katara says : " Thanks , Aang .
#Text=Maybe instead of saving the world , you can go into the jewelry - making business .
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't see why I ca n't do both .
#Text=" Katara says : " So , how do I look ?
